no download this.

Also make sure to bump up these two lines
MaxAnisotropy=
MaxMultiSamples=
to about 16 and 4 minimum.
Also see if this helps
AllowD3D11=True 
oh and turn on Vsync as well.

oh and these
DetailMode=
MaxDrawDistanceScale=
double those up
Damn Drawdistance and LOD don't do squat.
